3173.verse: وَجَحَدُواْ|And they rejected|140|162|13120$بِهَا|them,|58|102|1203$وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ|though were convinced with them (signs)|296|340|13121$أَنفُسُهُمْ|themselves,|99|121|3403$ظُلْمًا|(out of) injustice|132|150|3158$وَعُلُوًّا‌ۚ|and haughtiness.|133|168|13122$فَٱنظُرْ|So see|79|114|2332$كَيْفَ|how|66|101|288$كَانَ|was|57|92|913$عَـٰقِبَةُ|(the) end|83|100|3299$ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ|(of) the corrupters.|150|150|5118$

3174.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|96|640$ءَاتَيْنَا|We gave|78|91|509$دَاوُۥدَ|Dawood|78|91|4647$وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ|and Sulaiman|107|120|4646$عِلْمًا‌ۖ|knowledge,|94|107|5770$وَقَالَا|and they said,|115|128|13123$ٱلْحَمْدُ|"Praise be|85|92|5$لِلَّهِ|to Allah|70|83|6$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who|107|132|138$فَضَّلَنَا|has favored us|118|143|13124$عَلَىٰ|over|63|88|52$كَثِيرٍ|many|65|90|4453$مِّنْ|of|50|75|53$عِبَادِهِ|His servants|101|114|868$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believers."|115|115|1964$

3175.verse: وَوَرِثَ|And inherited|107|127|13125$سُلَيْمَـٰنُ|Sulaiman|89|130|951$دَاوُۥدَ‌ۖ|Dawood.|78|119|4647$وَقَالَ|And he said,|102|143|1089$يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا|"O|70|111|985$ٱلنَّاسُ|people!|75|95|112$عُلِّمْنَا|We have been taught|164|176|13126$مَنطِقَ|(the) language|118|142|13127$ٱلطَّيْرِ|(of) the birds,|113|138|2352$وَأُوتِينَا|and we have been given|182|206|13128$مِن|from|50|62|53$كُلِّ|every|57|70|185$شَىْءٍ‌ۖ|thing.|69|95|186$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|96|58$هَـٰذَا|this|59|85|248$لَهُوَ|surely, it|78|104|2957$ٱلْفَضْلُ|(is) the favor|108|134|4168$ٱلْمُبِينُ|evident."|80|93|5465$

3176.verse: وَحُشِرَ|And were gathered|146|162|13129$لِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ|for Sulaiman|101|134|13130$جُنُودُهُۥ|his hosts|94|127|13131$مِنَ|of|50|83|156$ٱلْجِنِّ|jinn|68|101|6030$وَٱلْإِنسِ|and the men|103|119|6041$وَٱلطَّيْرِ|and the birds,|112|196|13132$فَهُمْ|and they|79|248|152$يُوزَعُونَ|(were) set in rows.|147|231|13133$

3178.verse: فَتَبَسَّمَ|So he smiled -|115|136|13140$ضَاحِكًا|laughing|91|134|13141$مِّن|at|50|93|53$قَوْلِهَا|her speech|93|136|13142$وَقَالَ|and said,|80|123|1089$رَبِّ|"My Lord!|82|103|7$أَوْزِعْنِىٓ|Grant me (the) power|164|188|13143$أَنْ|that|48|97|655$أَشْكُرَ|I may thank You|129|178|13144$نِعْمَتَكَ|(for) Your Favor|127|176|13145$ٱلَّتِىٓ|which|61|86|232$أَنْعَمْتَ|You have bestowed|151|170|21$عَلَىَّ|on me|63|100|4174$وَعَلَىٰ|and on|77|114|67$وَٲلِدَىَّ|my parents|94|131|13146$وَأَنْ|and that|77|114|1470$أَعْمَلَ|I may do|78|96|13147$صَـٰلِحًا|righteous (deeds),|142|159|622$تَرْضَـٰهُ|that will please You.|155|190|13148$وَأَدْخِلْنِى|And admit me|110|145|13149$بِرَحْمَتِكَ|by Your Mercy|116|151|8274$فِى|among|63|80|89$عِبَادِكَ|Your slaves|96|327|4469$ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ|righteous."|117|348|1197$

3180.verse: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ|I will surely punish him|168|181|13155$عَذَابًا|(with) a punishment|153|178|2933$شَدِيدًا|severe|74|100|2934$أَوْ|or|41|66|154$لَأَاْذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ|I will surely slaughter him|187|200|13156$أَوْ|unless|61|119|154$لَيَأْتِيَنِّى|he brings me|104|220|13157$بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ|a reason|95|211|9542$مُّبِينٍ|clear."|66|124|3469$

3181.verse: فَمَكَثَ|So he stayed|108|116|13158$غَيْرَ|not|61|78|560$بَعِيدٍ|long,|60|77|1514$فَقَالَ|and he said,|101|118|332$أَحَطتُ|"I have encompassed|161|178|13159$بِمَا|that which|91|108|43$لَمْ|not|42|50|63$تُحِطْ|you have encompassed|175|188|10906$بِهِۦ|it,|52|78|204$وَجِئْتُكَ|and I have come to you|179|205|13160$مِن|from|50|76|53$سَبَإِۭ|Saba|53|79|13161$بِنَبَإٍ|with news|87|100|13162$يَقِينٍ|certain.|71|71|13163$

3173.verse: And they rejected them, while their [inner] selves were convinced thereof, out of injustice and haughtiness. So see how was the end of the corrupters.

3174.verse: And We had certainly given to David and Solomon knowledge, and they said, "Praise [is due] to Allah, who has favored us over many of His believing servants."

3175.verse: And Solomon inherited David. He said, "O people, we have been taught the language of birds, and we have been given from all things. Indeed, this is evident bounty."

3176.verse: And gathered for Solomon were his soldiers of the jinn and men and birds, and they were [marching] in rows.

3177.verse: Until, when they came upon the valley of the ants, an ant said, "O ants, enter your dwellings that you not be crushed by Solomon and his soldiers while they perceive not."

3178.verse: So [Solomon] smiled, amused at her speech, and said, "My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants."

3179.verse: And he took attendance of the birds and said, "Why do I not see the hoopoe - or is he among the absent?

3180.verse: I will surely punish him with a severe punishment or slaughter him unless he brings me clear authorization."

3181.verse: But the hoopoe stayed not long and said, "I have encompassed [in knowledge] that which you have not encompassed, and I have come to you from Sheba with certain news.
